title: #BringBackOurGirls - 6 months on
teaser: It's six months since militant Islamist group Boko Haram sparked global outrage by abducting more than 200 girls from Chibok town in north-eastern Nigeria. Protesters calling for the release of the girls are today marching in the Nigerian capital, Abuja. What should the Nigerian government be doing for the missing girls?
